channel.title: How do i make these things:
channel.description:
How do i make commands? Can someone please give me an example that works of a tele and item command - also what folder is it in?
and also how do i make npc's give you xp or items or tele you when you speak to them ? can someone give me and example that works and what folder it is in ?
Thanks..
~~Devil~~

item.title: How do i make these things:
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Right this is an example of a tele command

else if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3089; }
The “home” is the command; Can change it to a suitable code - Simple Solved
and this is an example of a command that like spawns items etc etc…

else if (command.startsWith("barrows") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(4717, 10000); addItem(4719, 10000); addItem(4721, 10000); addItem(4723, 10000); addItem(4709, 10000); addItem(4711, 10000); addItem(4713, 10000); addItem(4715, 10000); addItem(4754, 10000); addItem(4756, 10000); addItem(4758, 10000); addItem(4760, 10000); addItem(4746, 10000); addItem(4748, 10000); addItem(4750, 10000); addItem(4752, 10000); addItem(4733, 10000); addItem(4735, 10000); addItem(4737, 10000); addItem(4739, 10000); addItem(4727, 10000); addItem(4729, 10000); addItem(4731, 10000); addItem(4725, 10000); }

Thats the whole barrow set.

[b]The " && playerRights >= 2)" is the player rights
1 = Pmod 2 = Admin 3 = Owner

Hint:Just find something like (“pickup”), And place the code(s) above that or under neaf it, this is how i’ve learnt o.O

Enjoy!

And sorry dont know what ya going on about with the npc bit

Read full topic
